延.definition: to prolong; to extend; to delay

延年益壽.definition: to make life longer; to promise longevity; (this product will) extend your life

延後.definition: to postpone; to defer; to delay

延攬.definition: to recruit talent; to round up; to enlist the services of sb

延期.definition: to delay; to extend; to postpone; to defer

延期付款.definition: to defer payment; to pay back over long term

延禧攻略.definition: Story of Yanxi Palace (2018 TV series)

延緩.definition: to defer; to postpone; to put off; to retard; to slow sth down

延續.definition: to continue; to go on; to last

延聘.definition: to hire; to employ; to engage

延誤.definition: to postpone (with unfortunate consequences); to take too long (to do sth); to miss (a deadline or window of opportunity)

延請.definition: to employ; to send for sb promising employment

延遲.definition: to delay; to postpone; to keep putting sth off; to procrastinate; (computing) to lag
